name: C
caption: Unit procurement cost
message: The unit procurement cost must be positive.

name: h
caption: Inventory holding cost
message: The holding cost can be either non-negative or non-positive (salvage value).

name: Pi
caption: Unit shortage cost
message: The unit shortage cost must be non-negative.

name: p
caption: Unit selling price
message: Leave the default value in case of a cost minimization problem.

name: i0
caption: On - hand inventory
message: The on-hand inventory must be non-negative.

name: S
caption: Ordering / Setup cost
message: Leave the default value in case of a ZERO ordering/Setup cost.

name: UD
caption: Demand
message: The demand values must be integer values entered in ascending order.

name: UP
caption: Probability
message: The probability values must sum to one.
